price: "Wannan (azãbar) kuwa sabõda abin da hannuwanku suka gabãtar ne. Kuma lalle ne Allah bai zama mai zãlunci ga bãyin sa ba."
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّامٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bimā qaddamat aydīkum wa-anna al-laha laysa biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
